Kristina Palmquist -

About

My name is Kristina Palmquist and I'm a JavaScript Developer living in Stockholm with my partner and two children. We have a comfortable apartment in Liljeholmen and an allotment with a small cabin where we spend a lot of our freetime during the summer. I also enjoy puzzles, bot crossword and jigsaw, walking and knitting. I got interested in programming after working 20+ years in finance, mainly accounts receivables and payables payables, reconciliation, and accounting.

Education

I have a degree in JavaScript Development from IT-Högskolan, a vocational university, where I acquired a strong base in fullstack and frontend development. During my first year at IT-Högskolan I also finished my bachelor’s degree in business at Stockholm University. After that I have continued with parallel University studies within the IT field to broaden my knowledge.

Internship

During the education I have successfully completed internships at two different startup companies with SaaS solutions (both in Angular), which has given me valuable experience and understanding of what it's like to work as a developer.

My first internship consisted of 8 weeks at Your Company Sweden AB. The company was founded in 2018 offer a SaaS solution called Ägaranalys. This service is designed for insurance brokers to help their clients understand how taking money out of their company can affect their personal and business finances. It provides a clear picture of the potential consequences of different financial decisions, allowing business owners to make more informed choices. My task was to build a new module where users can input salaries and benefit as well as equity stake and calculate the cost for the company. Supervisor/mentor: Per Ledberg

My secont internship was with Fill Technology AB Fill was founded in 2021. frontend development in Angular a little bit of backend in Kotlin Supervisor/mentor: Faik Siddiqi

Interests within programming

I enjoy implementing design and functionality, focusing on the user experience and responsiveness, with or without frameworks. My resume is built in Figma and I keep track of my applications in a kanban board. I am a flexible problem solver and thorough in my work, which allows me to analyse and solve problems effectively. I am driven by helping colleagues and customers and am always curious to understand their problems in order to offer the best possible solutions. My social skills allow me to create good relationships with both customers and colleagues in both Swedish and English. I'm used to working in teams as well as independently. In parallel with my job search, I enhance my skills through courses at university and online as well as listening to podcasts and reading online articles.
